files.patch:
@@ -49,2 +49,2 @@
-[JDK 16](http://jdk.java.net/16/) or later and [Gradle](https://gradle.org/)
-7.0 or later is required for building. To build the project on macOS or
+[JDK 17](http://jdk.java.net/17/) or later and [Gradle](https://gradle.org/)
+7.2 or later is required for building. To build the project on macOS or
@@ -72,1 +72,1 @@
-ensure that you have JDK 16 or later installed locally and JAVA_HOME set to
+ensure that you have JDK 17 or later installed locally and JAVA_HOME set to
@@ -87,2 +87,2 @@
-- JDK 16 or later
-- Gradle 7.0 or later
+- JDK 17 or later
+- Gradle 7.2 or later
@@ -227,1 +227,1 @@
-is JDK 16 or above. Either set this up manually, or [build](#building) once from
+is JDK 17 or above. Either set this up manually, or [build](#building) once from
@@ -232,1 +232,1 @@
-`<skara-folder>/.jdk/openjdk-16_osx-x64_bin/jdk-16.jdk/Contents/Home`
+`<skara-folder>/.jdk/openjdk-17_osx-x64_bin/jdk-17.jdk/Contents/Home`

@@ -76,0 +76,5 @@
+// Load deps.env and remove all double quotes
+def depsEnv = new Properties()
+file("../../deps.env").withInputStream { { depsEnv.load(it)}}
+depsEnv.entrySet().forEach(e -> e.setValue(((String) e.getValue()).replaceAll("\"", "")))
+
@@ -99,2 +104,2 @@
-            url = 'https://download.java.net/java/GA/jdk16/7863447f0ab643c585b9bdebf67c69db/36/GPL/openjdk-16_linux-x64_bin.tar.gz'
-            sha256 = 'e952958f16797ad7dc7cd8b724edd69ec7e0e0434537d80d6b5165193e33b931'
+            url = depsEnv.getProperty("JDK_LINUX_X64_URL")
+            sha256 = depsEnv.getProperty("JDK_LINUX_X64_SHA256")

@@ -57,0 +57,5 @@
+// Load deps.env and remove all double quotes
+def depsEnv = new Properties()
+file("../deps.env").withInputStream { { depsEnv.load(it)}}
+depsEnv.entrySet().forEach(e -> e.setValue(((String) e.getValue()).replaceAll("\"", "")))
+
@@ -83,2 +88,2 @@
-            url = 'https://download.java.net/java/GA/jdk16/7863447f0ab643c585b9bdebf67c69db/36/GPL/openjdk-16_windows-x64_bin.zip'

+            url = depsEnv.getProperty("JDK_WINDOWS_X64_URL")
+            sha256 = depsEnv.getProperty("JDK_WINDOWS_X64_SHA256")
@@ -94,2 +99,2 @@

+            url = depsEnv.getProperty("JDK_LINUX_X64_URL")
+            sha256 = depsEnv.getProperty("JDK_LINUX_X64_SHA256")
@@ -105,2 +110,2 @@
-            url = 'https://download.java.net/java/GA/jdk16/7863447f0ab643c585b9bdebf67c69db/36/GPL/openjdk-16_osx-x64_bin.tar.gz'
